JOB DESCRIPTION: Candidate is responsible for development, maintenance and support of cellular protocol stack software for mobile phones.       Proven software development experience in protocol layers 2/3/4 of at least one wireless telecoms standard namely 3G/4G       Good understanding of 3GPP specifications.       Experience in embedded software development.       Good analytical and debugging skills.       Design/Development of stack on RTOS based platforms.       C and/or C programming experience.       Good knowledge of 3G RRC (25.331). Preferable work experience in UE Protocol stack
